description: Number of T_0-covers of a labeled n-set.
comments: A cover of a set is a T_0-cover if for every two distinct points of the set there exists a member (block) of the cover containing one but not the other point.
links: Vladeta Jovovic, T_0-covers of a labeled 3-set
author: _Vladeta Jovovic_, Goran Kilibarda, Jan 16 2001
